dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to step into my domain, insignificant mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking answers and power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Answers and power? You shall find only death and despair here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm not afraid of death.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear is irrelevant. Your fate is sealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight to the end.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare to face the wrath of darkness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. Spare me, and I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your cowardice seals your fate. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is beyond your feeble mind. Ignorance is your curse.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove my worth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Worthless mortals cannot comprehend true power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then face me and see my determination.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your determination is futile against overwhelming darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept my limitations and will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed, know your place and depart.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wish for an alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance with the likes of you? Laughable!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My strength can be of use to you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength without loyalty is meaningless. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my service in exchange for knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but your offering is futile. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking a truce.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace and truce are foreign concepts in this realm of darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully if you allow it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your presence offends the balance. Depart at once.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defend myself if provoked.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defend all you like. Your end draws near.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your rule and bring light to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light in the darkness? Foolish mortal, your light will be snuffed out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not falter in the face of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery in ignorance is a swift path to doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My resolve is unbreakable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve without reason is foolishness. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will turn back, the darkness is too great.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice suits you well. Begone and be forgotten.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a chance for harmony between us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harmony with light is an abomination in this realm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our unity can bring balance to this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance through discord is not true balance. Embrace the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave and seek balance elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Seek in vain, for balance eludes the feeble-minded.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, let fate decide our conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fate has already sealed your demise in this realm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face fate with courage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Courage in the face of inevitability is a futile gesture.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defy fate and find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiance only quickens your descent into darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your motives and find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Motives in the shadows are inscrutable to one such as you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I aim to learn and grow from this encounter.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Growth in the face of despair is a delusion of the weak.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My resolve will not waver, no matter the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve in ignorance is a frail shield against true darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave, understanding this is not the place for growth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding comes too late for the doomed. Leave, unless you seek oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us find a way to coexist peacefully in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful existence in darkness is an illusion you cling to.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my strength to uphold this illusion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength in service of illusion is wasted. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will seek peace elsewhere, if not here.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace eludes the misguided. Seek elsewhere, or meet your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a contest of wills, not blades.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Will alone cannot pierce the veil of darkness around you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My will is stronger than any shadow.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength of will in ignorance is merely folly. Face your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will test my will against darkness and retreat if needed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat or not, darkness will claim you in the end.
